remarks: Submonoids are subsets that are also monoids with the same zero. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Mar-2015.)
statement:
issubm2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` M ) $.
issubm2.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` M ) $.
issubm2.h $e |- H = ( M |`s S ) $.
issubm2 $p |- ( M e. Mnd -> ( S e. ( SubMnd ` M ) <-> ( S C_ B /\ .0. e. S /\ H e. Mnd ) ) ) $.
